member.name: RASTERIZER_STATUS
member.summary: The RASTERIZER_STATUS structure contains information about whether TrueType is installed. This structure is filled when an application calls the function.

member.name: RASTERIZER_STATUS.nSize
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the RASTERIZER_STATUS structure.

member.name: RASTERIZER_STATUS.wFlags
member.summary: Specifies whether at least one TrueType font is installed and whether TrueType is enabled. This value is TT_AVAILABLE, TT_ENABLED, or both if TrueType is on the system.

member.name: RASTERIZER_STATUS.nLanguageID
member.summary: The language in the system's Setup.inf file.
